page.title: 04Farming in Knypersley.
page.content: Farming in the Knypersley area is mainly pasture.Most of the area is rough grazing moorland. Ladymoor Farm is a special unit owned and managed by Goeffrey and Carol Crawford.The farm specialises in free range hens and has not used artificial fertilisers since 1978.All materials used in food production are organic. The hens have the freedom of the full 20 acres of the farm during the day and are returned at night to sheds for protection.At present there are some two thousand hens but the owners have plans to expand to meet the increasing demand for their products. Greenway Bank Farm,situated in the centre of the country park,is a privately owned livestock farm.The stock are chiefly dairy cattle.Other farms in more exposed areas specialise in breeding sheep.
